name: Subsocial Network
intro: An open protocol for decentralized social networks
introduce: Subsocial Network is an open protocol that allows anyone to launch their own decentralized censorship-resistant social networks and marketplaces. With social networks built on Subsocial, users will actually be able to capture the value they produce through various monetization methods, like tipping, subscriptions, social tokens, selling ad space, and more. Additionally, Subsocial will feature an algorithm marketplace, letting users be in control of the content they see.
